column4: so i just did a apt-get upgrade and it set my resolution back down to 800x600... Why does this happen all the time?

my understanding is that the .conf files get updated, so if you backed up your xorg.conf files you should be able to quickly restore them, but you should move the settings from the old file to the new one manually.
it's a decent idea you have, however it's not so black and white.  launchpad.net has numerous bugs about various 'upgrading' issues
